statement.p: Explain how to find the dimension of W=\mathrm{span}\ \left\{\left[\begin{array}{r} 0 \\ 3 \\ 2 \\ -3 \\ 0 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -3 \\ 1 \\ -2 \\ 2 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} 12 \\ -13 \\ 2 \\ 1 \\ 4 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -2 \\ 2 \\ 0 \\ -3 \\ -1 \end{array}\right] , \left[\begin{array}{r} -20 \\ 14 \\ -8 \\ 3 \\ -7 \end{array}\right]\right\}.
